content: Although my focus is on backend, i also enjoy building {{full-stack}} projects.
My favorite tech includes {{Java (Spring Boot), Python, React & MySql or MongoDB!}}.
Want to know more? A bit about me. {{I, am...}}

{{01}} a {{self taught developer}} who embarked on a journey of self-learning, delving into the world of coding with a focus on Java, Spring Boot, and MySQL. Alongside, I acquired familiarity with React for frontend development. Through dedicated practice and exploration, I've cultivated a deep understanding of building robust digital infrastructures.

{{02}} a {{programming enthusiast}} who is fueled by passion for coding and the endless possibilities it offers. Embracing each challenge as an opportunity to grow, I'm enthusiastic about mastering new languages and technologies.

{{03}} an {{excellent communicator}} who thinks communication is key and it's a paramount value of mine. I believe in transparency and constructive communication above all else. This helps me develop deep relationships and ensures my effectiveness and productivity in any work space with any team.
If you like feel free to connect on LinkedIn.
You can always check out my work on GitHub.
You can find my resumÃ© over here => ResumÃ©
You can send email on E-mail.
{{Click}} on a section on the left to learn more about my {{projects}} and past {{work experiences}}.
You can also {{navigate}} through the sections using the {{arrow keys}} or {{just use the mouse}}.
